item.description:
Join us for dinner at The Cottage located in Chestnut Hill. They have a wide variety of menu items. You can check out www.cottagechestnuthill.com for more info. This will be a fun night, relaxing and enjoying a nice dinner. We look forward to seeing you!

 

As always, if your plans change, please be sure to update your RSVP. It is important that we have an accurate headcount. Please only sign up if you can definitely attend the event.
item.how_to_find_us: Look for Catherine (see photo) near hostess stand or at our table. If you have trouble finding us, please call 774 232 0000.
item.name: Dinner at The Cottage, Chestnut Hill
